cause.description:
The truth about drugs, sex, violence, alochol and suicide within the teen circle.
1. You do not need drugs to be happy.
2. Ending ones life will never make anothers happy.
3. Use your voice before you use your fist.
4. Think before you act.
5. Always "be safe".
cause.mission: brighten teens minds on the issues around them or which they may be part of.
cause.name: T.I.A - Teen Issues Awareness
